name: Lyra and the Echo of the Abyss
summary: Join Lyra, a brave mermaid with the power to heal emotions, on a magical adventure to save the ocean from darkness with the help of her playful sea friends.

name: Lyle in Cube Sector
summary: Lyle in Cube Sector is a freeware metroidvania where you work with cubes. With the right upgrades, you can throw them at enemies, use them to propel yourself higher, and make them materialize in your hands. You must use these abilities skillfully in the cube sector to find your cat.

name: Lying Souls
summary: Lying Souls is an atmospheric, mysterious single player story horror game. You'll dive into a story in which nothing is as it seems. Find out the reasons behind what happened to your family back then. Your decisions will guide the course of the story.

name: Lyra the Tenrec
summary: Three levels of classic arcade fun as you collect the crystal wafers while trying to keep eyeborgs at bay. Watch out for the indestructible Ztyx!

name: Lyra's Melody
summary:
When Ralle Peregrine was a child, he began to hear a mysterious melody in his head. Around the same time, his childhood sweetheart, Lyra Shire, began to lose her hearing.

As they grew up, Ralle became a guitarist to accompany the strange melody that only he hears whenever he closes his eyes. By then, Lyra had gone completely deaf.

He wrote many songs for her, but she could hear none of them.

name: Lynn: The Girl Drawn on Puzzles
summary: Easy move, difficult thinking A new type of puzzle rules that controls the room, not the characters Simple rules as it only need a simple control Still requires a lot of thinking and calculating in order to solve the puzzle.

name: Lymbus
summary: Descend into a digital labyrinth of our own making. Move around with your keys. Do everything else with your cards. Exercise maximum strategy in building your deck, then throw it out the window in screen-shaking, bullet hell-style battles. Combat happens in real time, meaning every moment matters.

name: Lyne
summary:
Deceptively simple. Infinitely complex. Lyne is a minimalist puzzle game that will knot your brain as it calms your soul.

Connect the shapes. Fill the board. Lose yourself in the interflowing paths of Lyne.

name: Lyra Convolution
summary: Lyra Convolution : The Future of Gaming is Here

name: Lyndaria: Lust Adventure
summary: Lyndaria: Lust Adventure is a non-linear erotic visual novel set on a lost island inhabited by Furry tribes. The naive but courageous character - Maya is waiting for exciting adventures, dangerous and savoury!

name: Lynn's Legacy
summary: Follow Lynn the mercenary as she recollects the mysterious mission that nearly took her life. Travel through multiple overworld areas, (forest, towns, desert, mountains) and boldly step into uncharted dimensions in search of memory!

name: Lycans
summary: Lycans is a multiplayer game up to 10 players. Investigate during the day to find the hidden werewolves among the villagers and hide at night to survive their attacks!

name: Lydia Was Here
summary: A horror RPG about how not to handle grief, identity, and the delusions of bringing someone back.

name: Lydia's Labyrinth
summary:
Lydia's Labyrinth is a "choose your own adventure" style visual novel, inspired by the classic old school game books such as the 'Fighting Fantasy' series.

Embark upon an odyssey through the Vampress' lair, seeking freedom, fortune, love, vengeance or even clues to your own origins!

name: Lynked: Banner of the Spark
summary: Team-up, brawl and build in this co-op action game that blends hack and slash combat with roguelite-inspired missions and town-building progression that goes beyond the run! Unlock and upgrade gear, rescue robot allies, and lead the resistance against the world-dominating Combots!

name: Lyrica & Lyrica 2 Stars Align
summary: Lyrica is a rhythm game that’s unique in many ways. It’s musically entertaining; it expresses literature artistically; it applied poetries in the gameplay and created a new gaming experience for the gamers.

name: Lyca
summary: A small, relaxing, incremental game about restoring a barren wasteland into a lush meadow. Help the magical wolf Lyca run through the land, gather resources, and unlock a vast upgrade tree.

name: Lysfanga: The Time Shift Warrior
summary: Your Kingdom’s fate relies on you… you… and you. Rewind time to create clones of your past-selves, and fight with an army of your own. Become legion and triumph over hordes of monsters to rescue Antala in this Hack'N'Slash game with a tactical twist.

name: Lyre
summary: Darkness reigns under the Lyre’s curse. Wield magic to uncover a richly interactive 3D world teeming with puzzles, enemies, and hidden rewards on your quest to stop the dissonance that's spreading throughout the land.

name: Lyre
summary: Lyre is a romance furry visual novel story where you travel to a strange kingdom as a human ambassador, surrounded by diverse characters. Your only weakness is that you have no idea what their motives are. They're all deceiving each other and every one of them is better at it than you. You find yourself only able to trust the most unlikely individual as a terrible plot unfolds around you.

name: Lycah
summary: Lycah - The Enchantress is an episodic saga from the team behind the Thorne series that puts you in the role of Lycah, a young woman troubled by her past.

name: Lyrvane Park
summary: Lyrvane Park is a first-person horror puzzle-adventure set in a children’s theme park. Use "Radar of Emotions" to search for the remaining emotions of children, activate rides, and open doors. The "Staff Only" areas hide darkness, fear, and the most terrifying secrets of the park.

name: Lyle in Cube Sector MD
summary: A freeware metroidvania originally made by BogoSoft in 2006, now ported to Sega hardware by Mike Moffitt.

name: Lycoris
summary: Lycoris is an anime-style survival shooter set in realistic environments. Fight relentless zombie hordes, survive wave after wave, and choose your character to face the night.

name: Lysward
summary: Lysward is a single-player survival adventure set in a vast and unforgiving desert in the fantastical world of Umbra. Explore, craft, team up with your companion, and leverage the Amri magic to endure the heat.

name: Lydia
summary: A story-focused adventure game about a little girl in the world of adults. How can you find a monster you can’t see?

name: Lyset Core
summary: A horror visual novel set in a steampunk universe. Young Lyset finds herself wandering through a mysterious world of sentient machines. In her desperate search for her long-lost brother, she must choose between death and immortality.

name: LyokoVR
summary: LyokoVR is a VR fanmade game continue the story after X.A.N.A has been destroyed by the Multi-Agent Program. Now the team mission is stopping X.A.N.A gain its power again and bring Aelita's father back.

name: Lycanthorn II: Rain of Beasts
summary:
Lycanthorn II: Rain of Beasts is a 3d homage to retro classics. Explore an open world and use different characters to explore dungeons and lands full of demons and beasts from legend.

With First Person melee combat, you'll dash, dodge and dice around your enemies! Not a fan of melee? Try out the other characters that each have a variety of attacks.

name: Lysogenesis
summary: You need to take the ship apart to put yourself together. Play as a seed of intelligence rapidly developing the ability to sense the world around you. Unfortunately the world you're trapped inside is crashed, and power is running low.

name: Lyrane
summary: A top-down shooter developed by Glodia for Japanese computers.

name: Lyantei
summary: Work at your aunt's inn and help your guests with their problems. Can your decisions save your aunt's livelihood or will all the labour be in vain?

name: Lya
summary:
Lya (Lee-ah) Sato is a half Japanese, half European student, attending the prestigious Gozen Primary & Secondary School. A pretty boring place of education, save for the odd incident from time to time, such as students letting lose their pet ferret or fireworks being let off in the toilets.

That is, until one fateful Friday afternoon, where the school becomes the scene of an horrific attack, one that will shock the core of the nation and the world.

Lya, along with everyone else trapped inside what has now become a living nightmare, must seek to survive and find a way to escape the dangers lurking the school corridors, with some of them, not even being from this world...

Explore the corridors and classrooms of Gozen. Solve the puzzles and riddles that bar your path, as you move from corridor to corridor, room to room, world to world...

Work with other students and teachers as you see to discover the motive behind the attack on the school...if you're able to survive long enough that is...

Play as Lya, who is on her own personal journey through this ordeal. Uncover her past in a world that will try its best to drag her into oblivion.

Multiple hours of gameplay, memorable boss battles, an intriguing storyline, many unique environments, unforgettable music, varied gameplay and the promise of tension, horror, dread, anguish and revulsion.

name: Lynn
summary: In this Oriental Painting, there are many mazes and monsters created by the Nine-tailed Fox.Let's safely guide Lynn back home by moving the puzzle pieces drawn on top of the Oriental Painting.

name: Lyratha: Labyrinth - Survival Escape
summary: Far away from the fate of the world and time, deep in catacombs and vaults of long-forgotten places, the Lyratha Order conceals his existence, without knowledge of humanity outside.

name: Lykia: The Lost Island
summary: From the producers of Pets Rescue and Alpharay comes their biggest 8-bit production yet! Lykia is an epic quest for the C64 and expanded C16 + Plus/4 that spans 4 disk-sides! The beautifully presented adventure features lots of characters to interact with as you help Nora on her magical quest to find the lost island.

name: Lycanthorn III
summary:
Join Rain in a short, sweet, action packed adventure through haunted forests, decrepit villages, and cold cobbled ruins...

Collect cash to buy powerful sidearms and upgrades, gather the five orbs to unlock Dracula's Castle, retake Morvania from the Vampires!

name: Lyric Legend 2
summary: Music based mobile game

name: Lynne
summary: Lynne is a short story about the scariest thing in the world - being a teenager.

name: Lylia's Deadline
summary: Lylia's Deadline is an action-platformer inspired by games such as Mega Man X, focusing on new mechanics and movements.

name: Lysium: Stardiver
summary: In the distant rings of the planet Alphios, rookie mechanic Samantha Krain takes her first careful steps into the field as an official member of a crew of misfit space salvagers. When a huge salvage mission turns up on the surface of the planet, however, the race is on as opportunity calls to be the first one to reach a trove of technology. Is it fortune smiling upon the intrepid explorers, or is treachery leering from the shadows...?

name: Lycoris;Lastwords
summary: Deliver three recently departed souls to the afterlife -- and keep their thoughts comforted. As best you can, at least.

name: Lythe The Forgetful Witch: A Visual Novel
summary: Guide Lythe, a naïve witch on a journey through the spooky world of Samhain, as she seeks the High Witch and rediscovers her magic. This visual novel features spell crafting, rune seeking, and memory game mechanics, all while unraveling the desires of her monstrous friends!

name: Lyonesse
summary: Explore the magical island of Lyonesse. Lose yourself in a labyrinth of pleasure and beauty. A game inspired by Japanese Shunga and the Celtic legends of Lyonesse's Sunken Isles. Enter a hand-drawn vision of mythology, where nymphs frolic freely through a garden that bears the fruits of succulence.

name: Lyssophobia
summary: The less you know the better.

name: Lycanthorn
summary:
Lycanthorn is a game inspired by Castlevania, made in 3D!

This short little game will take you through 8 levels of Vampire slaying action

name: Lynx Casino
summary: Ever wish you could take a thousand dollars and head for Vegas, Monaco, or a Caribbean cruise? Here's the next best thing! Five exciting games in one give you the real feel of a high-roller's favorite casino!

name: Lynium
summary: Lynium is a competitive 2D and 3D music video game You can play the different traditional or original game modes

name: Lyser
summary: Casual puzzle with laser reflections.

name: Lymph City Blues
summary: Take on the role of a detective immune cell named Dan Dendrick in this neo-noir narrative. Track down and uncover the murderer of the mayor of Lymph City using your sleuthing prowess and bring justice back to Lymph City...for no one is immune to justice.

name: Lyssa
summary:
"Let us live, since we must die"

Lyssa Is an RPG developed by Vih. You will be playing as Alayss, a college student warped into the Soul World, a world full of demons and deceased spirits. Will she be able to find the person who kidnapped her while trying to regain the faith of her late best "friend"? Or will she fall into despair?

name: Lyara
summary: In an unknown world, a girl look for answers around her and deal with her inner feelings at the same time. Face numerous challenges to reach answers and grow up with the kid.

name: Lysfangha
summary: Embody the demi-goddess Imë and purify the temple where the Lysfangha is kept. Using your temporal powers, duplicate yourself by going back in time. Cooperate with your clones to repel the invasion!

name: Lyssa: Goddess of Rage
summary: Various battlefields with random obstacles and different heroes with unique bonuses to hone your strategy skills. Explore the map, defeat powerful bosses, build your story line, accept quests and embark on a journey! Assemble your forces and lead your party to Victory!

name: Lys and Ruka's Magical Bag
summary: Something strange is afoot as a mysterious dungeon appears outside the town of Litos. Gather weapons and items to fight the enemies before and get out of sticky situations in this fast-paced action RPG from desunoya!

name: Lydia: Sweet Dreams
summary: Lydia: Sweet Dreams is a fast paced, intense reflex game, which challenges players to survive and defeat waves of enemies in its vibrantly colorful world.

name: Lyrica
summary: Lyrica is a rhythm game using classical Chinese poetries released on iOS and Android devices.

name: Lyrical Letters
summary:
When I was a young boy, my momma bought me a tiny Casio keyboard from a Sears Bargain Centre. Now Sears is gone, and Casio isn't cool anymore.
Or is it? Anyhoo...
You know what is cooler than cool? Having a hi-lo-fi digital keyboard word game right in your back pocket. Synthesizer? Check. Chiptune? Check. Guitar? Check. Clever word puzzles? Double-check.

name: Lylia's Deadline: Clearance
summary: A sequel to the original Lylia's Deadline which features high-speed 2.5D gameplay, low-poly 3D graphics, Rocking music, and more heat-based combat mechanics.

name: Lyrestruck
summary: This game follows Irina, who's been wandering through an endless forest, in search of an exit. Will she discover the roots of this curse and break out?

name: Lyric Legend
summary: Music based mobile game

name: Lyric Sonata
summary: A miniature sidescrolling adventure across music notation platforms, for solo cursor.

name: LyraVR
summary: LyraVR lets you compose and interact with fantastical music sequences from entirely new perspectives in virtual reality. Create loops, hand place and tune your sounds in space, press play, and enjoy as your musical masterpieces come to life around you.
